description: The purpose of this Contract is to update the following Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) datasets...
full_summary:
# **Public Tender Announcement**

### **Project Title**

Update of Canadian Precipitation Datasets

### **Reference Number**

cb-8477-34994858

### **Solicitation Number**

5000073434

### **Tender Status**

This solicitation has expired on 2023-09-18 and is no longer active.

### **RFP/Solicitation Type**

Request for Proposal
(Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner pour la version française)

### **Procurement Method**

Competitive - Open Bidding
(methode d'approvisionnement concurrentielle - invitation ouverte à soumissionner)

### **Contracting Entity**

*   **Environment and Climate Change Canada**
*   Address: 351 boul. St-Joseph, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0H3

### **End User Entity**

This contract is for Environment and Climate Change Canada.

### **Project Description**

The successful bidder will be required to update four datasets for Environment and Climate Change Canada:

*   The Adjusted Daily Rainfall and Snowfall (AdjDlyRS) dataset
*   The processed daily total precipitation dataset from all automated gauges
*   The processed CoCoRaHS dataset
*   Use the updated data to refresh the 425 joined long-term precipitation data series

The bidder will need to process daily precipitation data from all manual and automated stations across Canada.

### **Trade Agreements**

This contract will be subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### **Regions of Opportunity**

This contract opportunity is available across Canada.

### **Regions of Delivery**

The successful bidder must be able to deliver the updated datasets to Environment and Climate Change Canada locations in Ontario (except NCR).

### **Notice URL**

Downloadable documents are available on [canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

### **Contact Information**

*   **Name**: James Molinski
*   **Email**: [james.molinski@ec.gc.ca](mailto:james.molinski@ec.gc.ca)
*   **Phone**: (819) 975 - 1856
*
